nodes.bodyText: this is too long, what is an expected size for the ios certificate?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -44,7 +44,7 @@ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `app_info` (
   `from_email_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
   `from_email_password` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
   `ios_bundle_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
-  `ios_certificate` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
+  `ios_certificate` varchar(7000) DEFAULT NULL,

nodes.bodyText: this column contains Base64 encoded value of .pem file , hence it depends on the pem file . With this value only it allowed to update ios certificate value when we tested locally.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -44,7 +44,7 @@ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `app_info` (

   `ios_bundle_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
-  `ios_certificate` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
+  `ios_certificate` varchar(7000) DEFAULT NULL,

nodes.bodyText:
that does not answer my question.
What is the length of the certificate you are currently using?

also, PEM is already base64 encoded.
